website_summaries.verdict: Packed with vitamin B-5, this watery serum offers long-lasting hydration.
pros: A Refinery29 beauty award winner suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily
Contains a unique blend of apple/lentil/watermelon complex that helps boost skin's radiance
cons: While it is suitable for all skin types, customers with oily or combination skin seem to see the best results

customer_reviews.title: Results in only two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Revised to show the 8 week photo. I continue to be very pleased with this product! Previous review: Great results in just two weeks! I was looking for a non-laser way to reduce sun spots, ran across the reviews of this serum and decided to give it a try. I’m so glad I did! My sun spots are noticeably lighter in only two weeks. I have used consistently morning and night in combination with a toner and moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriellenic

customer_reviews.title: Sun spots vanishing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 10 days and my age spots are already fading. Very excited to see what happens in a few more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nanine

customer_reviews.title: Abrasive & Possibly Glass in Serum!?
customer_reviews.text: This serum feels like it has grains of sand in it. It's murky and doesn't compare to other vitamin c serums out there. I can't stress how awful and abrasive this serum is. I tried to give it the benefit of the doubt, but honestly it feels like there are glass pieces in my bottle and I'm extremely disappointed in the quality. I cannot in good conscience recommend this product. Hopefully mine is just a defective bottle.
customer_reviews.author: William tell-you-like-it-is

customer_reviews.title: truskin naturals C
customer_reviews.text: it was okay for me. I used it for my face every day after washing my face for 1 1/2 months. My face looked glow but nothing improved noticeable difference on my skin. I am 66 yrs old but look 40 to 45 yrs old. I will not buy it cuz it did not work for me. I am using powder vitamin c to diy serum that is much cheaper to do diy serum. Also, using red light therapy recently.
customer_reviews.author: cpns72

customer_reviews.title: True skin serum
customer_reviews.text: I was obliged to try this product because of the numerous positive reviews. I am a firm believer of positive reviews. Unfortunately, after about five days of trial, applying it to my face morning and evening as what the instruction stated. My face started to show red rashes, itchy at times. So I discontinued use. Many have positive results on their reviews and I am not contesting that. I am not saying that this product is ineffective, it just did not work for me considering we all have different skin chemistry and compatibility. It simply did not work for me. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Got more wrinkles after using this product.
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product on December 1, 2018. I recently started using the TruSkin C Plus super serum in the evening. And the C in the morning. Well I can tell you that my skin as worsened dramatically over the past week. I’m not sure if it is from the C Plus or not but only had a few fine lines under my eye area and now I have terrible looking wrinkles on my upper cheek area as well as crows feet that I never had before. I pray that stopping the use of this product those wrinkles will go away as I never had them before.
customer_reviews.author: Mommalyon

customer_reviews.title: TruSkin Brand works!!
customer_reviews.text: HONESTLY!- it’s hard to rate this one alone but I have purchased the super plus from the same brand along with a generic version of nurse Jamie facial roller.... in 4 uses a dog bite scar on my face wasn’t noticeable under makeup & barely noticeable now without makeup!! I only use that one every other day as it does cause some slight burning after use but totally tolerable & worth the results! I just received this one & will be taking photos!
customer_reviews.author: @JustNurseJen

customer_reviews.title: This product caused me to have a rather severe contact ...
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to have a rather severe contact dermatitis on my neck and around my eyes after several days of use. I had to stop using it and now look all puffy and dry around my eyes. My neck area is red and irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I got this to use it as a moisturizer but After using it for 10 days I realized it’s meant for deep layers of the skin! I used to use the night repair serum from Estée Lauder but Unfortunately I couldn’t afford it so I started looking for something a bit cheaper but with a good quality! My advice to you is that use this and put a thin layer of a moisturizer on it after 5min! Im definitely going to order more and try different products of TruSkin.
customer_reviews.author: shermin

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients Changed!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this stuff in the little bottle but I noticed the Larger bottle doesn’t have the same ingredients (see photo), and also no longer says “98% Natural 72% Organic” Not sure if that’s a little bottle to large bottle difference or if they’ve changed the entire formula Larger bottle no longer has “Kosher Vegetable Glycerol” and has added “Wildcrafted Horsetail” to lable.
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: There's no way these ppl had these results with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how or why someone would make a false review. There's no way these ppl had these results with this product. I used and followed instructions, and I saw no change in my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lyssyn

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not the same as previous orders..
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed from the quality of this product I received this time. I have ordered this several times in past but this time The product is something else. What i have experienced this time is: The consistency is not as thick as it used to be. I don't feel any thing on my face after the application unlike before my face would feel plumped and tight. If i am paying the money you are charging then why would you send something different that is not as strong and same formulary? Not going to buy it again..
customer_reviews.author: Mkaur

customer_reviews.title: Acne flare up after only one day of use!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product based on the great reviews. But sadly, I woke up the next morning with numerous pimples all over my face. I do not have acne problems, so it was definitely the introduction of this product to my routine. What's worse is that they do not offer refunds, so it was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sishel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - Save your money and time
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. I purchased a DS different one from clarity on Amazon prior to this one and had such great results but they only had 1oz bottles, so figured to get this one since it's a 2oz and boy do I regret it. It hasn't done a thing for my face. My dark spots are actually getting worse rather than better. Really, just save your money and time. I even tried to return AMD was supposed to receive a label but that never happened.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No L-Ascorbic Acid! Most important to have!
customer_reviews.text: From my research the only kind of vitamin C that can penetrate the skin is L-ascorbic acid, Which this does not have and I can tell as soon as I put it on my face. I was taking a much better one at a reasonable price but I guess they got sued by a company the Chargers close to $100 or for theirs, which is outrageous. I had to buy my own L - Ascorbic Acid powder to mix with this to make it worth anything to me. It did mix well, thus the stars. If they change the formula to L-ascorbic acid I would buy it all the time, until then, not again.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Eberle

customer_reviews.title: "YOU'RE 65??"
customer_reviews.text: Yep, that's what I hear. All the time. Granted, some of it is genetics, I suppose, but of all the moisturizers and serums I've used over the years--from high-end to drugstore--I have to say that the TruSkin Vitamin C serum is the one I have stuck with the longest--coming up on 2 years now, I believe. I put it all over my face--including my eyes--and I absolutely do see a difference in lines, firmness, texture, glow...all that stuff we talk about. I also use it on my neck and decolletage, hands, and elbows. Highly recommended!!!!! P.S.: I do the "bikini shave" thing, and I use it as an "after-shave," too. Plus after the shower. No bumps, no ingrown hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Malka Rose

customer_reviews.title: As A Black Man I will be buying MORE
customer_reviews.text: This product was literally a life savior. I did not believe the hype but the price is so cheap i mean why not try it. I thought: Years of Acne scars could not of be fading with a simple serum, i mean come on. Nope this WORKS in DAYS, but because I did not believe it I forgot to take before pictures. My wife noticed the difference and that really is all that matters! 100% For sure Please give this a try before going down the hole of no return with expensive products. If it does not work trust me give it some time, it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Glowing skin, an affordable vitamin c serum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product. I have been unsure of whether to start using vitamin c serum for some time now, and I took the plunge on their smaller bottle. I used that up and loved the results. My skin is glowing! I use a spin brush and cleanse my face, and with this as the next step my skin is on the right track. I have noticed less blemishes using this as well. It also goes on the skin lightly and doesn't take long to dry. I find a few drops on my hand is enough. I will definitely continue purchasing this because it's helping my skin look more awake and rejuvenated.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Boomerang Serum
customer_reviews.text: I call this my "boomerang serum" because I have tried more expensive, hot new things on the market but I come back to TruSkin Vitamin C Serum. I have been using it consistently for several months and can definitely tell a difference in lightening of sun damage and small lines. I use it under my make up and before I go to bed. It is not overly drying. My aesthetician raves about my skin when I use and I dont leave with any salon product. Definitely recommend it....AND I definitely always wearing sunblock so the serum doesn't have to work as hard when you are my age. (~50) :)
customer_reviews.author: LizzieL

customer_reviews.title: Best vitamin c serum I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to this Vitamin C serum because it has worked the best for my skin. Other popular serums I've tried have been too greasy or ineffective. I have combination and sensitive skin which is acne-prone. I also have old cystic acne scars. While of course there is no magic serum to fully eliminate everything, the TruSkin Vitamin C has been the best at reducing redness and smoothing out scars. I use it every night before applying my night moisturizer. It's a dry serum, but if you're using it as a treatment serum then that shouldn't matter as much - it's not a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: Smell/Odor
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this product when it came in. However; after a week of using it I could no longer stand the smell. It gives a strong smell of ammonia or urine; the smell is so strong I couldn't keep the serum on my face because I thought I had layered my face with urine instead. (nasty). If the smell is due to its components in the serum, then I think they need to add some kind of fragrance to get rid of the smell. I'm pretty sure the serum itself works amazing but the smell it's too strong for me to handle. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Oreos

customer_reviews.title: Developed skin troubles.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this with great reviews But after about a week of applying this on my face deligently, i have had burning sensation on my cheecks and redness. I stopped using it to make sure what is causing it. Redness and burning got better few days afree but my face is flare up with dry, flaky spots all over. Ths serum also makes my skin dry. Almost like applying facial pack to close up your pores. I didn’t like the feeling and i had to rush to apply other moisturizer. Even afrer moisturizire, i still felt driness underness. I am very disappointed with this product. I am normally not sensitive to any skin products.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great for improving skin tone and texture! I have MELASMA and mild rosacea.
customer_reviews.text: The serum is top notch! I use the vitamin C face wash, this serum and the vitamin c lotion as well. As a middle aged woman with MELASMA and mild rosacea I have tried it all, THIS product line works! Great price with great results and fast at that!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: TIGHTENED 🙌
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. I’ve had it for quite awhile but haven’t been consistent with it. I recently started using it morning any night before my facial lotion and my skin has tightened up so much I’m literally amazed. I’ve been extremely self conscience at the age of 24 having wrinkles on my forehead and scares that looked like pores due to my sagging skin. I look younger and healthier just using it for a couple weeks. I feel more confident talking to people up close. My skin is evening out in color as well. My skin just simply looks way more healthy and I don’t have to kill myself to drink copious amounts of water.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few weeks now. I love how it feels going on. After it dries, I follow with a good moisturizer. My skin looks and feels wonderful! No more dry patchy spots. I can’t wait to see how much more it improves in the next few months. The customer service for this company is unreal. They reached out to me to see how I liked the product, and offered tips on how to use the product to achieve the best results. Don’t be afraid to give it a try. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: four stars, heading for five!
customer_reviews.text: I posted four stars because at this point I've only been using the C Serum for just over 2 weeks. I suspect I will bounce it up to five stars if it continues to perform as it has. I have noticed, An overall smoother look to my skin. Less redness on my nose and decollete. My skin just feels better, to the touch and just as the day wears on. I do follow this with the moisturizer which I love the feel of as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debi S.

customer_reviews.title: a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I did NOT see any difference in my skin using this product, and I gave it a chance for two months. I used it every day and night and not a change or improvement on my skin. Definitely, a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Gonzalez Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered faster. I have used it two weeks. Just a few days you can feel the improvement of facial skin damaged by some so-called moisturizer. While swear it, you will feel a little sticky, but it will be absorbed without knowing it. The most amazing thing is that it can replace the eye cream. I only use it once a day. Whenever I sleep well, I notice that wrinkles are reduced, especially the wrinkles around the eyes, and become younger. I also use it to apply the neck. I am lucky to find it. It deserves everyone to use.
customer_reviews.author: YUAN

customer_reviews.title: I love my TruSkin Vitamin C Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because of the high ratings and very high success rate. I have very dry skin and my skin drank this up. I have noticed a big change in my skin since I started using this product. If I forget to use it for a day I notice a huge difference in my skin. Plus the next time I use it I have to apply more product because my skin is so dry. The biggest thing I noticed in the shortest amount of time was the lines across my forehead have all but disappeared!!! Happy, happy me! I would and have recommended this product to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Charla

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with dry/sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very delicate skin on my face, and rarely experience acne. I use a low dose Retin-A cream that my skin has gotten used to for the most part, but still causes dryness. I wanted to use this product in rotation with the occasional Retin-A, but it broke my skin out horribly. I stopped using the Retin-A all together thinking the combo was too drying, but the continued use of this product caused acne and rashing all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin is so soft
customer_reviews.text: I have one dark spot that I was hoping this would work on, but I may have to get a chemical peel for that. However, what I have noticed is a complete softening and smoothing of my skin and just an overall better radiance and appearance. I went from having to wear foundation everyday to just a bit of BB cream and concealer. It is such a vast improvement. I am in my early 40's and I have suffered from acne since my teens. To have something improve my skin so completely is amazing! I have already purchased my second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Boundless Book Reviews Sara

customer_reviews.title: Radiant skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this serum inconsistently for over a year now. My skin is always luminous, clear , and my pores look smaller after just a few days to a week of using it. My friends and coworkers always notice and give me positive praise for having radiant skin when I’m using this product. No other product has ever warranted that type of positive feedback about my skin! I think I’ve dabbled with this product enough and I’m ready to make this a permanent part of my nighttime routine. If you aren’t allergic or sensitive to any of the ingredients in this bottle, get ready for the “special someone” and “possible pregnancy“ glow teasing!
customer_reviews.author: Bohemian_T

customer_reviews.title: I little bit disapointed..
customer_reviews.text: First time trying Vitamin C serum, heard good reviews on this one. However bit disapointed when i got it, it was to watery and cloudy. It says it suppose to be like that, but in ready more into it. Serums are not suppose to be watery or cloudy specially vitamin C serums. Maybe I got a bad bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the HA serum, Vitamin C serum, cleanser and daily facial moisturizer so I'm not sure if (1) product is better than the other, but I love how all of them make my skin feels now! I have always tried to take care of my skin, but it has changed with age. It wasn't as soft and it didn't bounce back like it had when I was younger. I have spent the last couple of years trying different products....and I finally found the combination that works for me. I also love that the scent is so light it is almost undetectable and the eye dropper is a great way to dispense the serum.
customer_reviews.author: Jan N.

customer_reviews.title: I love TruSkin's all products
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product and some other serums of the same company fairly regularly and i have been very satisfied with them seeing the positive effects on my premature wrinkles. i am in my early 30s and an healthy lifestyle freak but unfortunately my love for sunshine and beach sports started to take its turn on my skin. i had tried some other products trying to stick with natural ingredients but wasn't seeing any drastic changes. TruSkin on the other hand worked wonders and proved itself as the best product for my skin. Customer support team is also doing a wonderful job responding very attentively to each and every email. Very much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: asami padma

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. I have purchased this brand many times. it has helped my face tremendously. I also use it on my hands. I am in my 40's and people think I am in my 30's. Win, Win. love Vit C serum. I highly recommend it. It absorbs quickly into the skin and has no smell to it. I apply it before any of my moisturizers and it makes my skin feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jalemar

customer_reviews.title: Best Serum Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I have used TruSkin C Serum for several years with great anti-aging results. Recently, I was out of TruSkin and used several other serums (Mad Hippie, The Ordinary) for a few months. I began to notice lines between my nose and mouth that I attributed to aging. After re-ordering TruSkin C Serum and restoring regular use, the lines disappeared and my face is back to normal. The ingredients have done wonders to give my skin the moisture and nutrients to keep my skin healthy. I use the serum twice a day and after years of use, I know it is positively priceless!!
customer_reviews.author: C Tremont

customer_reviews.title: A staple in my facial routine
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my holy grail. I've had acne for pretty much my entire teen life and into my adult life. Home remedies and even prescriptions didnt help. I bought this after reading several articles about how it can help acne. I wish I had bought this years ago! It has cleared up my acne. I only apply it once at night and only need a pea sized amount, so a bottle lasts me quite a while. Doesnt have an odor or unpleasant scent. Doesnt make my face feel dry or sticky. It has also helps the roughness of my skin from acne scars.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It works marvelously!
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin C serum is fantastic!! I've been using it in conjunction with my derma roller and the results are fabulous!! I have noticed that my skin feels softer, and brighter. Along with some of my skin supposedly "permanent" blemishes are begining to fade. I will definitely be repurchasing this serum.
customer_reviews.author: Kjbengtson22

customer_reviews.title: Love the customer service and the product!
customer_reviews.text: My package looked as though it had been tampered with or had been opened & possibly already used/leaked. Customer service for Truskin reached out to me within 12 hours to remedy the situation. This was not my first time buying from TruSkin- I LOVE the product! I especially love the fact that it is SAFE to use while pregnant. (*I personally consulted with my dermatologist about the Vitamin C serum, which my dermatologist said was fine to use throughout the entire duration of pregnancy). My skin is super volatile and has cleared up thanks to TruSkin! I appreciate everything about this product and hope that this glowing review helps someone else's skin glow too :)
customer_reviews.author: Lois Kessel

customer_reviews.title: Organic & Awesome Skin Products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month now and although I am not totally out of the serum, I just purchased a 2nd bottle. I was using Shiseido products but it has gotten quite pricey. I've had some dark spots on my cheeks and I noticed it has gotten lighter. I also started using the toner and the cleanser. My skin feels soft as it did with Shiseido but if I can cut costs, its a deal. I will continue to use it and also try their moisturizer. I am getting ready to purchase the toner & cleanser again.
customer_reviews.author: gariam

customer_reviews.title: but I am very happy I took a chance
customer_reviews.text: I have dark spots from pregnancy that did not fade after 3 years. I was skeptical buying this product, but I am very happy I took a chance. I used this product as suggested 2x a day for the last few months on my dark spots. The spots slowly have decreased in size, and are reduced by about half the total original diameter. To be clear, my spots are not completely faded, which is why I am giving 4 stars, as opposed to 5. However, I will continue using the remainder of the 30 oz bottle I purchased, and will be purchasing another bottle to continue use.
customer_reviews.author: MaryK

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t dislike this product, but am still not sure what I like about it. I like to give new products time to do what is advertised and Rome wasn’t built in a day and consistency is key to good results. I like the convenience of the dropper in dispensing the right amount. I just ordered my second bottle so we’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Yasanadi

customer_reviews.title: Bend using for several months, love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying/using this product for quite some time. This is actually my 5th purchase. Generally, it is a good product that I've been very please with; however, my recent order is EXTREMELY gritty. UPDATE: TruSkin reached out to me regarding the grittiness of the product and went above and beyond to fix the issue. Very pleased with their efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Young

customer_reviews.title: My best serum so far
customer_reviews.text: I like this serum very much, I used it for about a year, and then decided to give it a break and instead was using one very famous serum of famous brand, and it was horrible, three month now and I am about to run back to my C serum. It helps me with acne, it makes my skin more tight, it helps my skin looks fresh, and it really good to get rid of fine wrinkles near eyes or nose. By the way, I usually use it 2 times a day, mornings it goes instead of primer and night time just after washing my face before any lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: good solid product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product! It's the first thing I apply after cleansing my face and my skin drinks it right in without feeling heavy or oily just supple. I then apply a moisturizer. My skin looks brighter and feels softer. Wears well under makeup as well. My skin texture and appearance have been improved and I feel like I'm doing something positive to enhance my appearance with the Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid. The price is reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Walborn

customer_reviews.title: No improvement on my sun spots.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product for my sun spots on my cheeks. I have used it religiously for 2 months and have seen very little results. I literally do not notice a difference. I will continue to use it though until I receive another product I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Linda 559

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This serum has really improved my complexion, my skin is smoother, softer and minor discolorations and scars from old pimples have faded. I've purchased Vit C serum from other sellers at much higher prices and this is better; take it from me, this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kae S.

customer_reviews.title: Immediately Improved the Tone of My Skin
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products and seller. The Vitamin C serum has made a significant and immediate improvement in the tone of my skin; will probably used it for the rest of my life. Looking forward to trying the TruSkin moisturizer. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Lajla Dale

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in my fifties and am frequently looking for new products to help slow down the signs of aging, and am usually disappointed. But this really works for me! It tightens and brightens my skin, and works better than any other serum I've tried (including an expensive department store brand which I don't think I'm allowed to name). I've only been using it for a little over two weeks but have noticed a difference, which was surprising (in a good way!). I'm excited to see how my skin continues to improve, and am getting ready to place another order.
customer_reviews.author: Portlander

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th bottle!! I love it and it has served me very well. Looking forward to trying other products made by this company! In addition, this product is great for discoloration on different parts of your body, not just your face. It evens out your skin tone without lightening the area.This is my 4th bottle!! I love it and it has served me very well. Looking forward to trying other products made by this company! In addition, this product is great for discoloration on different parts of your body, not just your face. It evens out your skin tone without lightening the area.
customer_reviews.author: Mayowa O.

customer_reviews.title: Noticed subtle improvement in skin tone after a month.
customer_reviews.text: Noticed subtle improvement in skin tone after a month. This product is best used in a humid environment. If you live in a dry climate, use extra moisturizer on top of this product. The natural Vitamin-C ingredient promotes healing of damaged skin. Hoping to reduce some dark spots after about 4 months. Do get enough sleep, eat well and exercise to promote your body’s health to achieve good results!
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, I love it. I have acne prone/oily skin with sun damage and ever since I started using this my skin has seriously never looked or felt better. I’m not oily at all, zero breakouts, and I swear my freckles/sun spots are fading. I’m also noticing a decrease in my forehead wrinkles. I will buy this over and over again. The price is amazing as well. This is an honest review, I paid for this product on my own. You will not be disappointed if you purchase this!
customer_reviews.author: Erin H

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This serum does not go on smooth or moisturize. I have been using this for 2 weeks after shaking the bottle to distribute the ingredients evenly. It is sticky and cannot be smoothed on face. I am totally disappointed in this product. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue G

customer_reviews.title: Loving so far
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite serums so far. I have super dry skin and most things make my skin break out. Especially serums or oils. Can’t do things with lots of ingredients. So this works well, feels nicely on the skin and dries up fast. Can’t say I’ve noticed really any changes yet but at lest I’m not breaking out and I’m hoping to see changes in the future. Will keep you posted. Have only had it about 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Grant

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought a small bottle to test and felt like my skin cleared up and I was using minimal makeup. When that was near done, I decided to buy the big bottle and unfortunately didn’t have the same results. My skin is dry. I use this twice a day, morning and night and it isn’t holding up to the results I had with the smaller bottle. Haven’t changed diet, and granted it’s winter, I’m using a more powerful moisturizer cause this is just ok. No real scent which is nice and I have somewhat sensitive skin and this doesn’t irritate.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I saw an improvement almost immediately. As most people do... I researched the ingredients and this product has just the right combination to stimulate regrowth of healthy cells.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service ever!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have to say this company has so.e of the beat customer service I have ever seen, and I work in customer service. I have received multiple emails and a complimentary bottle to access my needs since at first I was not completely satisfied! I have been using this for almost 2 weeks. I want SO BADLY to like it! It was recommended to me by a friend. So far I have not seen any difference or improvement. I also got another bottle that was on a lightning sale (said friend said I would run out and be sorry lol.) I guess I will have to be patient and update later!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product and causes fungal acne
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! DO NOT USE! I had perfect skin and this product gave me fungal acne and caused my forehead and cheek to suffer from reddish white bumps. I saw many 1 star reviews suffer from the same problem. This product doesn’t match the review rating. Go buy something that is better and has been tested properly with experts. Beware of bad products. This is your face and your skin the most important thing.
customer_reviews.author: FJano

customer_reviews.title: Loving this product!
customer_reviews.text: Only been using this for about 10 days, but my dark spots do appear to be lightning up, which is what my main concern is right now. This sirium has little smell, a nice texture, and soaks into my skin nicely with no tacky feel. I’m using it morning and night before putting my daytime/night products on and they both work well with this product. Great price and nice personal follow-up from the company! I’m also using the Eye Gel and loving the results I’m getting with the texture and tone around the delicate eye area.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne E. Huntress

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product so far
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for 24 days already. I like the serum because it glides on my skin very smoothly and it gets absorbed right away. It's not greasy at all. I think it has lightened up some of my blemishes. I don't have any complaints of the product. This is my first bottle. I usually give a new product a trial of one bottle and if it works I will continue using it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Broke me out
customer_reviews.text: I tried this one and off to see if it was the cause of my acne and it was. I had to stop using it . Also it’s very sticky even when you apply the instructed amount. I really wanted to like this serum because i heard such great reviews but it just didn’t work out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Briani

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: I used the entire bottle on my face and back of hands to treat brown spots and hyperpigmentation. I saw no change. It did make my skin soft and controlled oil in the t zone. Update: Although this product was not right for me the customer service team refunded my purchase and offered suggestions on other products that might be a better option. Very happy with the customer service I received.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recomendable
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. This is not the first time that I buy this product with this seller and have to say that the seller service is amazing. Very customer service oriented and confident on this product. The product is very, very good and why not I love the price. It doesn’t do miracles or de not give surgery results, any product does, but if you want your face to look better using natural products, but. E realistic, this definitely is the product. This make me trust in the company and I will get more products from them.
customer_reviews.author: marina

customer_reviews.title: Smooth clear skin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always struggled with combination skin and breakouts. I don’t understand it but my skin is smooth and clear after using this for a few months. I use it morning and night and it’s a staple in my routine now. My sisters have even complemented how nice my skin tone looks lately.I’d say the stuff is just as good as the top dollar serum you’ll buy at a dermatologist.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: No words for how great this product is!
customer_reviews.text: I cant even begin to describe how much I love all 3 bottles of Truskin I purchased. I'm not getting any younger but this product blows me away. I work as a flight attendant so I am constantly using different soaps, wash clothes washed in various detergents, a variety of pillows, causing my face to break out. Your product has worked wonders on evening out, tightening, and clearing my face/neck/back. I recommend it to so many of my coworkers because we are all constantly battling the same issue with uneven and irritated skin. I'll continue to promote this amazing product and remain a loyal customer of Truskin. It's a miracle worker!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work.dried my skin
customer_reviews.text: it was cloudy,.tried it several times,it made my skin itch,..and made my face dryer,i never have pimples,yes after using this product i noticed a pimple on my cheek..i dont have sensitive skin..but this stuff is terrible..waste of money..
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: A True Believer
customer_reviews.text: Twice I've been lured away from this product, and twice I've returned. First was trying another Vit C serum; they are NOT all alike. Second was being enticed to use a well-publicized new serum. But my skin was not as soft as with TruSkin. I'll stick with it from now on. How does it do on wrinkles? Well, I'm 64 so fighting a losing battle against time and nature, but I'm often told I don't look that age. I figure if my skin feels better, it must look better.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie R. Barbarito

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps.
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this product. I am 70 years old and I definitely see an improvement in my fine lines and wrinkles. I use this with the retinol moisturizing cream so between the two I had very good results. Not sure which to give the credit to so I'm giving them both highmarks.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation and irritation
customer_reviews.text: After a few days of dilligent use, I got redness and burning sensation all of over my cheeks. I stopped immidiately. Hoping it goes away. I am not normally sensitive to skin products, I even use tretinoin and doesn't cause any irritation. This product is not good. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dervish

customer_reviews.title: Nice Beauty product!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy to purchase this face care product at affordable prices by TruSkin. As described, the serum indeed provides nutrient, brightening up and tone down the pigmentations on my face effectively after applying for a week. Didn’t feel any tingling and no redness spots on my face, and I would assume that the product is suitable for my sensitive skin type. Nice beauty product!
customer_reviews.author: wellbeing65

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing I don't like about this serum.
customer_reviews.text: After you wash your face, watch the difference happen in the mirror when you apply this serum. I use it twice daily on my face, neck, chest, and the back of my hands. I consider it to be the best thing to ever happen to my skin. There is one thing I don't like. I have dropped and broken the glass container twice. Learn from my mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product, also the customer service it’s very kind and answer every question or if you need a recommendation on what product can be better for you they answer right away.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend a 100%!
customer_reviews.text: Their customer service is amazing! I was using truskin a couple years ago and I loved it. Saw a difference in my skin, but for some reason went searching for another serum. Along the way I wasted a lot of money on very expensive serums that I didn't like very much. Week before my wedding I was stressed and breaking out, so I went back to the truskin serum and within days my face looked so much better! My wedding pictures looked great and I think truskin serum had something to do with that! 😀 Recommend a 100%! I hope to try more of their products!
customer_reviews.author: Leena 😍😀

customer_reviews.title: Lasting Benefits if used consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I have used TruSkin for about 3 years, and I use it every single night on my face and neck. I credit this serum with helping me not get so wrinkled, especially in the neck area. I am a senior citizen who is often told that I look 5 to 10 years younger than my actual age, but this did not happen overnight. Consistency is key to keeping your skin looking good.
customer_reviews.author: OSV

customer_reviews.title: A Real Review  This stuff is Marvelous!
customer_reviews.text: My skin looks Marvelous after using this. People at work are asking you look younger than you are! I love this stuff. When my boyfriend and I are out people think I am his way younger sister. It sounds like some people may be allergic to this, however you should give it a try. I tried the little bottle first and now I get the larger bottle. My skin loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmerz

customer_reviews.title: Best C Serum I've found!
customer_reviews.text: Frankly, I'm a little in love with my products from TruSkin Naturals. Men absolutely benefit from taking good care of their skin - for me, TruSkin products (C, AHA, Retinol & C-Plus Super Serum) have helped my face look better, fresher and more healthful. I would strongly recommend TruSkin products - the quality is superb, and you CANNOT beat the price, in this humble reviewer's opinion...
customer_reviews.author: Rob in Bloomington

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a product from an MLM that I liked, but the cost for the amount of product was getting costly. I did some research and decided to try the smaller sized bottle of this. I am so glad I did! Not only do I feel that this product works better, but the cost is great! I am loving this product!! A friend just asked about my skin and this is what I recommended to her. I cannot wait for her to try it!
customer_reviews.author: DVIZ

customer_reviews.title: Diminishes appearance of wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this formula for a couple of years, and it really has improved the appearance of my skin. I used to put a dropperful of it when I first started using it, but now I get much better results with just a few drops. Using too much of it at once will make weird little curdles of the product on your face. Over time, the results are great!
customer_reviews.author: JC S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is pretty dry and during winter months, like most of us, my face becomes even more dry. I use this daily, day and night before my moisturizer and eye cream (I use Estee Lauder creams). It is great! It is light, there is no scent, absorbs in to skin within a minute or so. I have purchased this 4 times and will continue to do so. It lasts a long time, a little bit goes a long way. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mtz Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the serum twice a day now, and have also applied it to my eye area. It’s lightened the dark spots on my eye lids quite a bit. I am very pleased with the results so far! I am hoping that all my dark spots will become barely noticeable with long term use. The seller’s service has been excellent and greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: LISTEN. THIS STUFF IS GOLD. It’s a good price and it works really well! I wish I had before and after pics of my face. I started a 3 step process in March. I cleanse, apply the vitamin C serum then, use the retinol moisturizer. And my face has been so healthy looking and breakout free! Highly recommend. If you’re on the fence, just try it!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Simply didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t seem to do anything for my skin. I’m 37 and my skin has taken a down turn in the last few years. I think this is just not strong enough for my skin needs. It’s possible this could work for someone younger or without so many needs.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B.

customer_reviews.title: when I found that Tru Skin sells a Super C serum
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this and used it twice a day, everyday. I didn't seem to have any problems with sensitivity. I did notice some skin improvement...mainly in brightness. However, when I found that Tru Skin sells a Super C serum, I stopped using the traditional serum on my face and have just been using it on my chest and hands. I must say that I really like using the regular C serum on my chest and hands. If I don't use the product for a few days, my skin knows. If you are considering trying this serum, it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer but didn’t help with dark spots
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for several months. It’s a must! It’s so good, I could just put some on and it’s moisturizes so well, you don’t need a face lotion afterwards. I still use a moisturizer but you immediately can feel your skin absorbing it and leaving your skin soft and more firm! I originally got it for dark spots. It did nothing for them. Again great moisturizer for the skin and healing minor cuts too!
customer_reviews.author: Hong Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vitamin C serum!
customer_reviews.text: I started using TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C and HA serum several months ago. I have been very impressed and pleased with the results! I have relatively few wrinkles...but I wanted a clearer and brighter skin and that’s what I got! My pores seem smaller, my skin looks much more luminous. I use this serum on a clean face in the morning...then add the HA serum...then a tinted moisturizer and I’m good to go. I highly recommend this company...communication is especially good!
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With This Product
customer_reviews.text: I noticed results right away, within the first week, the age spots on my face are much lighter. I was using Eva Naturals Retinol serum for over a month and barely noticed any change. That's why I switched to TruSkin Nationals Vitamin C Serum, this product works really well, fast results, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I looooove these products!! The serum is so calming to my skin and doesn't make me break out!! I use this in conjunction with the eye serum and it works wonders! I'll be 40 years old this year and have acne flare ups, but also have dry patches around my chin and this balances my skin like no other product has!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Barker

customer_reviews.title: Better than those expensive serums
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye expensive serums! I was Looking for something that evened out my skin tone and helped with texture. I bought The 1oz yo feel it out and instantly my face was brighter and a lot more even toned. I swear By this stuff. I also Have tried a ton of Sephora serums , we are talking 100$ creams and this is still the best ! Totally worth every penny! Also should mention I use this at night and during the day. I use It under my moisturizer and then I Apply my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This works! I started to see some crows feet around my eyes. I've been using this for several months, not daily, sometimes I forget, but the crows feet are gone! It just makes my skin generally more clear and works to keep the wrinkles away.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: No visible change after using the whole bottle
customer_reviews.text: I went through the entire bottle before writing this review. This serum made my face breakup. My face felt dry after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bottle. I don't think it actually lightens dark spots or fixes wrinkles, but I didn't expect it to. I wear it as a base for my regular moisturizer to cling to--it works well for that--improves moisture significantly. Sometimes, I get a red spot on my face due to a allergic reaction; but I'm not sure if it is from this product or something else I put on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Margarite Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: 3 weeks to visible results.
customer_reviews.text: Got my first compliment today about my skin looking tighter and firmer! I started using this product about 3 weeks ago, daily in the morning, and let it dry about two minutes before applying my daily moisturizer with sunscreen. I noticed a difference after about a week; my skin felt smoother and looked tighter. I haven’t changed my skincare routine otherwise. I have enough in the bottle for about another week or 10 days, so this stuff lasts about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Never going to stop using this
customer_reviews.text: I have notice a big difference in my skin! I’m not breaking out anymore. I have normal skin type & my boyfriend who has oily and sensitive skin. His skin has the greatest impact from using this product! He loves it!! His skin has cleared and he has sensitive and acne.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because i had read about how good vitamin C was for your skin. I was amazed at the results. My skin is softer, healthier, and the small white bumps that I had are gone. I did not expect such results. I am extremely happy with this product!! I loved it sooooo much, I bought a bottle for my husband and two sisters. They LOVE it, also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for men too!
customer_reviews.text: Being 63 I have seen a lot of sun in my time and dark spots hit me hard years later so nothing to loose I tried this product and 4 months later I do want to say that this stuff works well at reducing my skin damage and removing old skin from my face.Also I bought the 2oz and 4 months later I have not even used half yet so it does go far.Try it you will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of vit c serum. I decided to buy the larger size since it is more economical. After using it for several months I have noticed some slight change in skin texture and smoothness. I live in a dry climate and that impacts my skin. It is difficult to keep it hydrated during the day. I will continue using for now and will see if I notice any significant skin change afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Salubrious

customer_reviews.title: Part of my skin care regiment
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle (a larger bottle this time) and I love using this! It’s made my skin firmer. My freckles and sun spots are lighter as well. I use it twice a day before applying moisturizer. TruSkin also confirmed with me that they are working with EWG to have their product verified which is an excellent news!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Changing my review
customer_reviews.text: I am actually changing my review for this product. I didn't like the product itself at first because it made me breakout, but the company contacted me, gave me a refund, and sent me another product (for free!) that they thought would work better. I am currently trying it out. Even though this particular product did not work for me, I think the company went above and beyond to make sure I have a good customer service experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sofiya Denisova

customer_reviews.title: Skin has more “Life”
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have very sensitive skin and have had no issues with the product. I recently ordered my second bottle! My skin feels more hydrated and appears less “dull”. I will be trying additional products for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya E.

product_meta.title: TruSkin Vitamin C Serum for Face with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Witch Hazel, Large Bottle 2 fl oz
product_meta.description:
Size:2 Fl. Oz

Who needs artificial fillers and harsh chemicals when you can achieve amazing results without them!

TruSkin is all about skin-friendly ingredients like Witch Hazel, Jojoba Oil, and Botanical Hyaluronic Acid. When combined with Vitamin C, these ingredients are known to have powerful anti-aging effects, support your body's natural collagen production, and help your body's natural response to common signs of aging such as brightness, firmness, fine lines, wrinkles, dark spots, and sun spots. Our customers have reported experiencing brighter, fresher looking skin, improved tone and clarity, smaller looking pores, fewer breakouts, and fewer visible fine lines.

Join millions of satisfied customers and begin your journey to healthier looking and feeling skin!*

IMPORTANT - This plant-based formula naturally ranges in color from almost clear to somewhat cloudy from batch to batch. TruSkin Naturals chooses not to hide these natural variations with artificial colors and synthetic stabilizers to ensure the formula is kept as pure as possible and because the appearance of the serum has no impact on the effectiveness of the formula.

*Results may vary; experimentation may be required as everyone's skin is different
feature_bullets: ANTIOXIDANT FACE SERUM - Vitamin C blends with Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, Witch Hazel, and Jojoba Oil to promote your skin's response to signs of aging like brightness, wrinkles, & dark spots
OUR CUSTOMERS KNOW BEST - Don't just take our word for it, see thousands of reviews from real Amazon customers rave about brighter, fresher looking skin

PLANT-BASED FORMULATION - No added synthetic colors, fragrances, parabens, phthalates, sulfates, PEGs, or GMOs. Our active botanicals combine in a silky smooth anti-aging serum that can be used day or night.
CERTIFIED CRUELTY FREE by Leaping Bunny, our Vitamin C facial serum is also formulated and bottled in the USA for guaranteed freshness
EXTENDED MANUFACTURER GUARANTEE - Love it or your money back! If for any reason you decide this product isn't a good fit for your skin, we offer a 90-day money-back refund
